title: I have a question linked to swain's ulti
body:
Swain's ulti was changed to heal the damage done before reduction

is it the same for {{champion:9}} W? {{champion:19}}  Q+R?

replies.body: It's not the same for them, they still heal a portion of the damage dealt, which is mitigated by  any MR the champ they're targeting has.
this means that swain is broken as shit.

What? No it doesn't. He heals about the same as he did before, actually less if there's less than 4 champs he's fighting against because they decreased the Raven-per-second (lol) and increased the maximum Ravens to 5. Just get grievous wounds if you hate it.

Swains not really that OP honestly. AP build a {{item:3165}}  and ADs build {{item:3033}} . Grab an early game {{item:3123}}  and it's like Swain has no healing at all. Dodge snares and avoid his Raven that drops a circle and you're good. Also, {{item:3139}} can save you
